EmailTemplate.description: Friendly Reminder of registration sent to all attendees
EmailTemplate.name: RI Spring Training 2009 Registration Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Courtesy Reminder of RI Training Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This is a friendly reminder of your registration for an American Student Assistance training event
You've been registered for the RI Training Event at Roger Williams University School of Law.
Date: March 17, 2009 Time: 10:00am to 2:00pm Directions: http://law.rwu.edu/sites/visiting/maps/
Lunch will be served.
Canceling Your Registration If you need to cancel or change your training registration please email training@amsa.com or 1-800-999-9080, ext. 3099.
Other Information All of ASA's training programs are offered free of charge. Please contact us at training@amsa.com or 1-800-999-9080, ext. 3099 with any questions about our training program.
In case of inclement weather, please call the number above to check for a delayed start or class cancellation. Updates will be done by 6:15am on the day of training.
We look forward to seeing you!
